entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries and periods of ice pellets beginning late in the evening then changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High 9.
